casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Leon A. MURPHY. No. 543P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2007. Derrick C. Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of October 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31:"

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2007."
